Detailed Description

This class is the base class for all consoles.

Member Function Documentation

void XConsole::activate ( bool  isReactivate  )  [virtual]

This method is called when the ConsoleManager activates this console.

The default behaviour is to no longer be the active console is this call is a reactivate.

Parameters:
isReactivate True if the console is currently active, otherwise false.

Reimplemented in HistogramConsole, DebugConsole, and TextConsole.

bool XConsole::allowDarkBackground (  )  const [virtual]

This method indicates if the current console allows the screen to be darkened before it is drawn.

Returns:
Returns true if background can be darknened.

Reimplemented in CallbackConsole, and HistogramConsole.

bool XConsole::isCursorShowing (  )  const

This method returns whether or not the cursor is showing.

void XConsole::line ( int  line,
const wchar_t *  src,
size_t  len 
)

Copies a buffer into the given line.

If the source buffer is less than the width of the line, the rest of the line is filled with spaces. If it is longer, then it is clipped.

wchar_t * XConsole::line ( int  line  ) 

Gets the buffer for the given line.
